body_html: @civilmanxx I had the same issue before. You can check whether your have enough space in the directory that the .ckpt files are stored. When I run inception-v3, by default those files are stored in /tmp and my machine only has 2 GB for /tmp, and then the "resource exhausted" error happened.

body: @civilmanxx I had the same issue before. You can check whether your have enough space in the directory that the .ckpt files are stored. When I run inception-v3, by default those files are stored in /tmp and my machine only has 2 GB for /tmp, and then the "resource exhausted" error happened.
